articles.title: Billions spent on Afghan army ultimately benefited Taliban - Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Built and trained at a two-decade cost of $83 billion, Afghan security forces collapsed so quickly and completely — in some cases without a shot fired — that the ultimate beneficiary of the American investment turned out to be the Taliban.

articles.title: Pfizer submits data for 3rd dose approval in US - New Straits Times
articles.description: WASHINGTON: Pfizer and BioNTech on Monday submitted preliminary clinical data to US health authorities as part of their effort to seek authorisation for a third dose of their Covid-19 vaccine for all Americans.
